text: Motion
Motion

Asahi!
Good work.

Ah, Producer-san.
Here you go!

Haha, thank you. But please distribute the
samples to someone else, not me.

The client seems to be pleased with it.
It would be helpful if you keep it up.
Yes, sir!

Being an idol involves various tasks like this,
not just singing and dancing.

Yeah, that's right.
Idol work covers a wide range of activities.

Like assisting in events or campaigns,
as in this case.

Mm-hmm... But being praised means
I did well even though it was my first time, right?
It was quite easy.

Oh, well... it went well this time, but
it won't always be like that.

Of course, I'll support you to make it go smoothly.
So, I want you to listen carefully.

I see...
I don't really understand.

The difficult parts,
I'll leave them to Producer-san and Fuyuko-chan!
Huh?

I'm heading home for today!
See you tomorrow!
Ah, Asahi...!
*sigh*
